name: Beary
effect: Your opponent's cards' effects don't affect this card.

name: Knight
effect: On your turn, this card wins all tussles it enters.

name: Archer
effect: NOT WORKING - This card can't start tussles. You may spend CC to remove stamina from cards.

name: Snuggles
effect: NOT WORKING - When sleeped, you may sleep a card that is in play.

name: Raggy
effect: This card's tussles cost 0. This card may not tussle on the first turn of the game.

name: Copy
effect: This card acts as an exact copy of a card you have in play.

name: Twist
effect: Put a card your opponent has in play in play, but under your control.

name: Rush
effect: Gain 2 CC. This card may not be played on your first turn.

name: Toynado
effect: Put all cards that are in play into their owner's hands.

name: Clean
effect: Sleep all cards that are in play.

name: Ballaber
effect: You may sleep 1 of your cards to play this card for free.

name: Dream
effect: This card costs 1 less for each of your sleeping cards.

name: Demideca
effect: Your cards have + 1 of all stats.
